summary:
Senior software Developer with a strong technical background, Overall, 12 Years of IT experience in which 
8 years industry experience in analysis, design, development, implementation, documentation and testing of Java/J2EE based enterprise applications using Spring, Hibernate, MVC frameworks, designing and developing high performance, large scale distributed enterprise applications using Microservices, Spring boot, REST, AWS, Jenkins, Ansible, Openshift  Kafka, and MongoDB/Oracle DB. 

Also 4 years worked as Computer Science Lecturer for Bachelor and Master IT programs.

Experienced in implementing Java Enterprise applications using JSP, JSF, Javascript, Servlets, Spring, Spring boot, hibernate, Kafka, Ansible, Jenkins, Harness, Openshift, Oracle and Mongo DB

school.name: Maharishi University of Management, Fairfield, IA, USA

projects.title: Online Shopping System
projects.description: JAVA EE application for commerce and shopping, including cart, registration and Vendor management, report generation and Third party card validation using Web Services. Technologies include Spring Framework, Hibernate, MySQL, RESTful Webservice, Jasper Reports, Net Beans, Tomcat, BootStrap, AJAX and Git.

contributors.headline: System Analyst - Tech Lead at Sammons Financial Group Companies

profile_positions.description:
Design, develop, implement, support, and maintain complex Java applications.
● Work with team members and supervise junior developer from beginning of product lifecycle through
application release.
●	 Performed various DevOps tasks: Server configuration, Build, Deployment and infrastructure management.
●	Worked on CI/CD pipeline by using Jenkins, Harness, Openshift and Ansible.
● Analyze the system flow and take appropriate actions regarding enhancement.
● Developed and consuming Restful Web Services using media applications like JSON, XML and Text data.
● Used Spring framework for dependency injection of services and integration of repository layer.
● Used microservices for connecting various services and design and develop message publish/consume API using Kafka.
● Used Mongo DB/Oracle Db for data persistance.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Project:
Central Billing Management System: Developed and implemented pilot project called Central Billing Management System (CBMS). CBMS communicates with various clients to sync (store and retrieve) billing information using restful web service. Involved in functional and non functional requirement specification. Developed desktop client using Java Swing and web based client using HTML,CSS, JSP, Servlet. Used REST API to connect client with central system and sent data as JSON which CBMS store in its local repository.

Responsibilities:
•	Developed web based applications using Spring frameworks and modules such as Spring MVC, Dependency Injection, Spring Core & Spring JDBC.
•	Designed and Developed User Interactive Web pages with the help of HTML5, CSS, Type Script, Bootstrap, JSON and Angular2. 
•	Developed and consuming Restful Web Services using media applications like JSON, XML and Text data.
•	Utilized framework to bind HTML template (views) to JavaScript object. Worked with Angular2 routes, services, directives and components to set up the test flow. 
•	Used POSTMAN for testing the web services, both in-house and external.


Environment: Agile,  HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON, Java, A Web Services, Spring, Spring-MVC, Hibernate, MySQL, Eclipse, Maven, Jersey API, JUnit, GIT, Apache Tomcat application Server.
profile_positions.title: Information Technology Officer

profile_positions.description:
Client: CVS Pharmacy Inc, Woonsocket, RI, USA			                February 2016 – September 2016
 Java Developer

Project:
Point of Sale (POS) System:
Designed and implemented “multi-layered” Point of Sale system using various Java based technologies, CBASIC, DBPL etc. Implemented system to read barcode information from store, process the information and implement the transaction.

Environment: Java, CBASIC, Apache tomcat, Spring, Spring tiles, XML, JSON, Restful web service.

Client : Goldman Sachs, Jersey City, NJ, USA                                                                                      April 2015 - February 2016
Java Developer

Project:
Private Wealth Management System:
Implemented Private Wealth Management System to support various investors from setting up their initial account to overall investment strategic services.

Environment: Java, JSP, Spring, Hibernate, AGILE/SCRUM Methodology, JavaScript, JQuery, JSON, JMS, JBoss application server, JDBC, JNDI, XML
profile_positions.title: Java Developer

company.name: Inland Revenue Department(IRD), Ministry of Finance

profile_positions.company: Inland Revenue Department(IRD), Ministry of Finance
profile_positions.description:
Project:
Integrated Tax System: Involved in implementation of web based application that performs all tax returns from taxpayers. Assembled requirements from user. Partnered with different teams for requirement analysis, business functions, security, user interface, and hardware / network capacity. Develop registration module and excise module. Performed applications tests to ensure optimal performance and established training for users on new system.

Responsibilities:
•	Analysis and Design of various modules of the system.
•	Used agile (scrum) development project methodology.
•	Involved in analysis, design and development of system components.
•	Used OO Techniques – UML methodology (use cases, sequence diagrams, activity diagrams).
•	Developed service layers and business layer using Java, JSP, Servlet, Spring framework

Environment: Java 1.4, JSP, Servlets, Spring frame work, Tag libraries, Java Script, CSS, AJAX, JDBC, JNDI, Oracle 8i, Java beans
